structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.text: No corporate body or instrumentality of the Commonwealth, advisory committee, interstate compact, or other statutory body, attached to or within the cabinet, shall expend funds, hire employees, issue grants, or otherwise engage in the normal administrative process of the cabinet. All of these bodies shall be provided administrative and support services by the cabinet.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998.
